listitem.para: Check whether the specified TIM interrupt flag is set or not.
Clear the specified TIM interrupt flag.
Check whether the specified TIM interrupt source is enabled or not.
Clear the TIM interrupt pending bits.
Set the TIM Prescaler on runtime.
Set the TIM Counter Register value on runtime.
Get the TIM Counter Register value on runtime.
Set the TIM Autoreload Register value on runtime without calling another time any Init function.
Get the TIM Autoreload Register value on runtime.
Set the TIM Clock Division value on runtime without calling another time any Init function.
Get the TIM Clock Division value on runtime.
Set the TIM Input Capture prescaler on runtime without calling another time HAL_TIM_IC_ConfigChannel() function.
Get the TIM Input Capture prescaler on runtime.
Set the TIM Capture Compare Register value on runtime without calling another time ConfigChannel function.
Get the TIM Capture Compare Register value on runtime.
Set the TIM Output compare preload.
Reset the TIM Output compare preload.
Enable fast mode for a given channel.
Disable fast mode for a given channel.
Set the Update Request Source (URS) bit of the TIMx_CR1 register.
Reset the Update Request Source (URS) bit of the TIMx_CR1 register.
Set the TIM Capture x input polarity on runtime.

para.para: Clear the specified TIM interrupt flag.

entry.para:
specifies the TIM interrupt flag to clear. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_FLAG_UPDATE: Update interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC1: Capture/Compare 1 interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC2: Capture/Compare 2 interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC3: Capture/Compare 3 interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC4: Capture/Compare 4 interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_COM: Commutation interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_TRIGGER: Trigger interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_BREAK: Break interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC1OF: Capture/Compare 1 overcapture flag
TIM_FLAG_CC2OF: Capture/Compare 2 overcapture flag
TIM_FLAG_CC3OF: Capture/Compare 3 overcapture flag
TIM_FLAG_CC4OF: Capture/Compare 4 overcapture flag
new state of FLAG (TRUE or FALSE).

para.para: Clear the TIM interrupt pending bits.

entry.para:
specifies the interrupt pending bit to clear. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_IT_UPDATE: Update interrupt
TIM_IT_CC1: Capture/Compare 1 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC2: Capture/Compare 2 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC3: Capture/Compare 3 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC4: Capture/Compare 4 interrupt
TIM_IT_COM: Commutation interrupt
TIM_IT_TRIGGER: Trigger interrupt
TIM_IT_BREAK: Break interrupt

section.title: __HAL_TIM_DISABLE

para.para: Disable the TIM peripheral.
Disable the specified DMA request.

entry.para:
specifies the TIM DMA request to disable. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_DMA_UPDATE: Update DMA request
TIM_DMA_CC1: Capture/Compare 1 DMA request
TIM_DMA_CC2: Capture/Compare 2 DMA request
TIM_DMA_CC3: Capture/Compare 3 DMA request
TIM_DMA_CC4: Capture/Compare 4 DMA request
TIM_DMA_COM: Commutation DMA request
TIM_DMA_TRIGGER: Trigger DMA request

para.para: Disable the specified TIM interrupt.

entry.para:
specifies the TIM interrupt source to disable. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_IT_UPDATE: Update interrupt
TIM_IT_CC1: Capture/Compare 1 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC2: Capture/Compare 2 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC3: Capture/Compare 3 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC4: Capture/Compare 4 interrupt
TIM_IT_COM: Commutation interrupt
TIM_IT_TRIGGER: Trigger interrupt
TIM_IT_BREAK: Break interrupt

para.para: Disable fast mode for a given channel.

entry.para:
TIM Channels to be configured. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: TIM Channel 1 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_2: TIM Channel 2 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_3: TIM Channel 3 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_4: TIM Channel 4 selected

note.title: Note
note.para: When fast mode is disabled CCx output behaves normally depending on counter and CCRx values even when the trigger is ON. The minimum delay to activate CCx output when an active edge occurs on the trigger input is 5 clock cycles.

para.para: Reset the TIM Output compare preload.

entry.para:
TIM Channels to be configured. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: TIM Channel 1 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_2: TIM Channel 2 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_3: TIM Channel 3 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_4: TIM Channel 4 selected

para.para: Enable the TIM peripheral.
Enable the specified DMA request.

entry.para:
specifies the TIM DMA request to enable. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_DMA_UPDATE: Update DMA request
TIM_DMA_CC1: Capture/Compare 1 DMA request
TIM_DMA_CC2: Capture/Compare 2 DMA request
TIM_DMA_CC3: Capture/Compare 3 DMA request
TIM_DMA_CC4: Capture/Compare 4 DMA request
TIM_DMA_COM: Commutation DMA request
TIM_DMA_TRIGGER: Trigger DMA request

para.para: Enable the specified TIM interrupt.

entry.para:
specifies the TIM interrupt source to enable. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_IT_UPDATE: Update interrupt
TIM_IT_CC1: Capture/Compare 1 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC2: Capture/Compare 2 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC3: Capture/Compare 3 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC4: Capture/Compare 4 interrupt
TIM_IT_COM: Commutation interrupt
TIM_IT_TRIGGER: Trigger interrupt
TIM_IT_BREAK: Break interrupt

section.title: __HAL_TIM_ENABLE_OCxFAST
section.programlisting: (((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_1) ? ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR1 |= TIM_CCMR1_OC1FE) :\ ((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_2) ? ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR1 |= TIM_CCMR1_OC2FE) :\ ((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_3) ? ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR2 |= TIM_CCMR2_OC3FE) :\ ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR2 |= TIM_CCMR2_OC4FE))

para.para: Enable fast mode for a given channel.

entry.para:
TIM Channels to be configured. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: TIM Channel 1 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_2: TIM Channel 2 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_3: TIM Channel 3 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_4: TIM Channel 4 selected

note.title: Note
note.para: When fast mode is enabled an active edge on the trigger input acts like a compare match on CCx output. Delay to sample the trigger input and to activate CCx output is reduced to 3 clock cycles.
Fast mode acts only if the channel is configured in PWM1 or PWM2 mode.

section.title: __HAL_TIM_ENABLE_OCxPRELOAD
section.programlisting: (((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_1) ? ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR1 |= TIM_CCMR1_OC1PE) :\ ((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_2) ? ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR1 |= TIM_CCMR1_OC2PE) :\ ((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_3) ? ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR2 |= TIM_CCMR2_OC3PE) :\ ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR2 |= TIM_CCMR2_OC4PE))

para.para: Set the TIM Output compare preload.

entry.para:
TIM Channels to be configured. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: TIM Channel 1 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_2: TIM Channel 2 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_3: TIM Channel 3 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_4: TIM Channel 4 selected

para.para: Get the TIM Autoreload Register value on runtime.

entry.para: or 32-bit value of the timer auto-reload register(TIMx_ARR)

para.para: Get the TIM Clock Division value on runtime.

entry.para:
clock division can be one of the following values:
TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV1: tDTS=tCK_INT
TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV2: tDTS=2*tCK_INT
TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV4: tDTS=4*tCK_INT

para.para: Get the TIM Capture Compare Register value on runtime.

entry.para:
TIM Channel associated with the capture compare register This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: get capture/compare 1 register value
TIM_CHANNEL_2: get capture/compare 2 register value
TIM_CHANNEL_3: get capture/compare 3 register value
TIM_CHANNEL_4: get capture/compare 4 register value
or 32-bit value of the capture/compare register (TIMx_CCRy)

para.para: Get the TIM Counter Register value on runtime.

entry.para: or 32-bit value of the timer counter register (TIMx_CNT)

para.para: Check whether the specified TIM interrupt flag is set or not.

entry.para:
specifies the TIM interrupt flag to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_FLAG_UPDATE: Update interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC1: Capture/Compare 1 interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC2: Capture/Compare 2 interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC3: Capture/Compare 3 interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC4: Capture/Compare 4 interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_COM: Commutation interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_TRIGGER: Trigger interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_BREAK: Break interrupt flag
TIM_FLAG_CC1OF: Capture/Compare 1 overcapture flag
TIM_FLAG_CC2OF: Capture/Compare 2 overcapture flag
TIM_FLAG_CC3OF: Capture/Compare 3 overcapture flag
TIM_FLAG_CC4OF: Capture/Compare 4 overcapture flag
new state of FLAG (TRUE or FALSE).

section.title: __HAL_TIM_GET_ICPRESCALER
section.programlisting: (((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_1) ? ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR1 & TIM_CCMR1_IC1PSC) :\ ((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_2) ? (((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR1 & TIM_CCMR1_IC2PSC) >> 8U) :\ ((__CHANNEL__) == TIM_CHANNEL_3) ? ((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR2 & TIM_CCMR2_IC3PSC) :\ (((__HANDLE__)->Instance->CCMR2 & TIM_CCMR2_IC4PSC)) >> 8U)

para.para: Get the TIM Input Capture prescaler on runtime.

entry.para:
TIM Channels to be configured. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: get input capture 1 prescaler value
TIM_CHANNEL_2: get input capture 2 prescaler value
TIM_CHANNEL_3: get input capture 3 prescaler value
TIM_CHANNEL_4: get input capture 4 prescaler value

input capture prescaler can be one of the following values:
TIM_ICPSC_DIV1: no prescaler
TIM_ICPSC_DIV2: capture is done once every 2 events
TIM_ICPSC_DIV4: capture is done once every 4 events
TIM_ICPSC_DIV8: capture is done once every 8 events

para.para: Check whether the specified TIM interrupt source is enabled or not.

entry.para:
specifies the TIM interrupt source to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_IT_UPDATE: Update interrupt
TIM_IT_CC1: Capture/Compare 1 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC2: Capture/Compare 2 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC3: Capture/Compare 3 interrupt
TIM_IT_CC4: Capture/Compare 4 interrupt
TIM_IT_COM: Commutation interrupt
TIM_IT_TRIGGER: Trigger interrupt
TIM_IT_BREAK: Break interrupt

section.title: __HAL_TIM_IS_TIM_COUNTING_DOWN
__HAL_TIM_MOE_DISABLE

para.para: Disable the TIM main Output.

note.title: Note
note.para: The Main Output Enable of a timer instance is disabled only if all the CCx and CCxN channels have been disabled

para.para: Disable the TIM main Output.

note.title: Note
note.para: The Main Output Enable of a timer instance is disabled unconditionally

para.para: Enable the TIM main Output.
Reset TIM handle state.
Set the TIM Autoreload Register value on runtime without calling another time any Init function.

entry.para: specifies the Counter register new value.

para.para: Set the TIM Capture x input polarity on runtime.

entry.para:
TIM Channels to be configured. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: TIM Channel 1 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_2: TIM Channel 2 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_3: TIM Channel 3 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_4: TIM Channel 4 selected

Polarity for TIx source
TIM_INPUTCHANNELPOLARITY_RISING: Rising Edge
TIM_INPUTCHANNELPOLARITY_FALLING: Falling Edge
TIM_INPUTCHANNELPOLARITY_BOTHEDGE: Rising and Falling Edge

para.para: Set the TIM Clock Division value on runtime without calling another time any Init function.

entry.para:
specifies the clock division value. This parameter can be one of the following value:
TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV1: tDTS=tCK_INT
TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV2: tDTS=2*tCK_INT
TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV4: tDTS=4*tCK_INT

para.para: Set the TIM Capture Compare Register value on runtime without calling another time ConfigChannel function.

entry.para:
TIM Channels to be configured. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: TIM Channel 1 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_2: TIM Channel 2 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_3: TIM Channel 3 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_4: TIM Channel 4 selected
specifies the Capture Compare register new value.

para.para: Set the TIM Counter Register value on runtime.

entry.para: specifies the Counter register new value.

para.para: Set the TIM Input Capture prescaler on runtime without calling another time HAL_TIM_IC_ConfigChannel() function.

entry.para:
TIM Channels to be configured. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_CHANNEL_1: TIM Channel 1 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_2: TIM Channel 2 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_3: TIM Channel 3 selected
TIM_CHANNEL_4: TIM Channel 4 selected

specifies the Input Capture4 prescaler new value. This parameter can be one of the following values:
TIM_ICPSC_DIV1: no prescaler
TIM_ICPSC_DIV2: capture is done once every 2 events
TIM_ICPSC_DIV4: capture is done once every 4 events
TIM_ICPSC_DIV8: capture is done once every 8 events

para.para: Set the TIM Prescaler on runtime.
Reset the Update Request Source (URS) bit of the TIMx_CR1 register.

note.title: Note
note.para: When the URS bit of the TIMx_CR1 register is reset, any of the following events generate an update interrupt or DMA request (if enabled): _ Counter overflow underflow _ Setting the UG bit _ Update generation through the slave mode controller

para.para: Set the Update Request Source (URS) bit of the TIMx_CR1 register.

note.title: Note
note.para: When the URS bit of the TIMx_CR1 register is set, only counter overflow/underflow generates an update interrupt or DMA request (if enabled)
